title: Ep. 2: 'The Watch'
description:
On today's episode of 'The Watch," Chris and Andy chat about Adele's '25' album (3:30 mark), applaud the new movie 'Spotlight," (14:50), and talk about the new Netflix show 'Jessica Jones,' (27:30) and latest episode of 'The Leftovers' (34:30).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
